Pre-Game Insights: Slovakia captain Milan Skriniar believes that his team's cohesive teamwork can counter England's reliance on individual brilliance.
Skriniar thinks the pressure is more on Gareth Southgate's side, given their status and expectations.
Skriniar stated that the media and fans have been critical after England's matches, so they will be under much more pressure than Slovakia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Slovakia advanced to the knockout stage by finishing third in Group E, where all four teams ended with the same pointsâ€”a first in Euros history.
The much-anticipated Slovakia vs. England clash is scheduled for Sunday, June 30, 2024, at 16:00 GMT.
Others: Slovakia captain Milan Skriniar has expressed confidence in his team's strategy as they prepare to face England in the Euro 2024 round of 16 clash.
